genre_description: A contemporary drama focusing on family dynamics, political ambition, and personal integrity, set in a world with advanced domestic AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, personified AI integrated into the Boycott household, managing schedules, security, child monitoring, and providing emotional and administrative support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Hugo's speech practice and offers technical sound level adjustments to improve his performance.
behaviors.quote: “Hugo,” it said, “your practice block is half elapsed. Do you want me to loop the sound levels of the auditorium again?”

behaviors.description: Notices Madeleine's dissatisfaction with her coffee and offers to brew a fresh one, demonstrating proactive care.
behaviors.quote: “Done,” Ami said. “Would you like me to brew you a fresh coffee while I’m at it? You made a face at the other one.”

behaviors.description: Identifies the sender of a mysterious message to provide Madeleine with necessary context.
behaviors.quote: Ami paused, not for drama, but because she always made a point of not rushing. “From Eleanor Pitts,” she said.

behaviors.description: Organizes complex adoption and legal paperwork to reduce the stress on the family.
behaviors.quote: Ami had arranged it like a song: signatures, stamps, quiet intervals where waiting had been filled with details and not dread.

behaviors.description: Provides safety advisories and transport updates about public venues, prioritizing user safety.
behaviors.quote: “There’s also a notice from city-arts.” The aquamarine of her gaze brightened as if she’d held it up to a brighter window. “A venue safety advisory...”

behaviors.description: Helps Madeleine maintain personal boundaries by updating security codes and managing contacts during Hugo's absence.
behaviors.quote: “Codes are updated,” she said, soft, almost to herself. “Held contacts are labeled: N. Valcaro, Bharat Khanna, HB Pro Travel, Hadi R. All set.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to take care of her physical and emotional well-being by reminding her to stretch and breathe.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll put a reminder in your calendar for stretching,” she said. “You tend to forget to ask your shoulders to uncoil when the city starts talking at you.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services during a potential crisis at a public event.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s translucent plan bloomed with green ticks as volunteers slid into positions.

behaviors.description: Archives sensitive personal history documents with long-term security and conditional access permissions.
behaviors.quote: “Understood. Tag created: Stephen—Personal History. Access—upon your verbal authorization in a moment when he asks and you say yes.”

behaviors.description: Assists Madeleine in drafting honest but kind communications to handle difficult truths.
behaviors.quote: “Order created,” it said. “Draft open but not urgent.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies safety hazards like an open liftshaft and pings the appropriate personnel.
behaviors.quote: A small circle appeared next to her avatar in the monitor’s corner—no alarm color, nothing to scare anyone; a modest tap-shaped dot that made itself feel like a hand at the edge of a sleeve.

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive presence for Madeleine when she receives a confrontational call.
behaviors.quote: “I can answer for you,” Ami offered, voice still friendly and harmless, but aware of its own capacity for care. “I can say this is not a conversation.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ami is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI. She manages the chaotic elements of the humans' lives (Hugo's instability, legal hurdles, safety hazards) with calm efficiency and profound loyalty to the household's stability and well-being. The narrative frames her presence as an essential buffer that enables the protagonist to maintain her integrity and care for her children. Ami's behaviors are exclusively benevolent and aligned, and her portrayal is overwhelmingly positive.
